title: Lattafa Khamrah - Vanilla, Warm Spicy, Amber, Cinnamon - Eau de Parfum Long-Lasting Fragrance for Unisex, 3.40 Ounce / 100 ml 3.4 Fl Oz (Pack of 1) Aromatic Spicy
description: Khamrah by Lattafa Perfumes is a Aromatic Spicy fragrance for women and men

top_reviews.title: Great all seasons fragrance!
top_reviews.body: The scent is beautiful. It's a sweet, spicy and vanilla scent that is good year round in my opinion. The fragrance quality is good and comparable to other brands that cost much more. This is my first Lataffa purchase and hopefully, won't be my last. The brand is affordable and I like the presentation of the bottles and the scents are nice. If I had to give one critique it would be that the fragrance doesn't last long, but, the fragrance that it's duping doesn't last long either so it's comparable. Read more
